name: Jose Garcia Olivia
bio: Jose Garcia Olivia is a Venezuelan artist based in London whose prac­tice nav­i­gates the col­li­sion of both iden­tity and labour. He holds an MA in Visual Communication from the Royal College of Art, London.

name: Betty Brunfaut
bio: Betty is co-director of Sold Out Publishing that aims to publish under-represented references in the field of graphic design. She uses her skills to push for sustainability and accessibility, such as campaigning to ban plastic straws in Belgium.
